111.content:
Soshi gasped feeling the 'mattress' move up and down. He blushed realizing, "Karin-chan?"

She was laying back crushing his queen sized bed beneath her collossal mass, poor bed never stood a chance. "Yes Karin-chan," Soshi nodded.

Karin giggles, "My belly is a better bed than that old thing that is now rubble under my ass isn't it love?"

Soshi blushed. "Yeah so big and warm,"

Karin was the biggest and most powerful student at the academy even the headmaster and teachers knew better than to upset her. Karin's belly alone was the size of the largest mattresses in the world more likely even larger, she had 25 flabby chins, her titanic breasts were so big they could completely trap a normal sized person forever, if the person fell into her valley of cleavage. Her collossal ass was so massive no human created chairs, beds, or couches could ever hold it. Karin's arms and legs were thicker than the largest tree trunks, her flabby feet would cause earthquakes whenever she moved and her flab jiggled like thick jello. Her flabby hands were larger than the largest dinner platters. Karin was Soshi's childhood sweetheart and his girlfriend.


There was a low roar from her monstrous blimp like belly to signify her seemingly neverending hunger. The blond blob beauty giggled and strokes it, "I took the liberty of having our breakfast brought here baby, I don't feel like going to the cafeteria today,"

"Okay Karin-chan," Soshi heard a knock on the door.

Karin smiles, "That must be the food deliverer," She opened the door with Telekinesis as a very fat lady but nowhere near Karin's girth rolled in a tray with a lot of silver covered platters on it. She brought the tray to the collosal vampiress and then leaves.

Karin giggles and smiles to her lover, "Soshi-kun dear, go ahead and eat what you want and then feed me what you don't eat," She winks at him making him blush cutely.

Soshi slides down her belly and lands on the floor, "Sure Karin-chan," He eats a portion of it and finishes.

Karin giggles and rubs her growling belly, "Come love, feed your princess,"

Soshi brought a huge platter filled with her favorite foods.

Karin opens her mouth Soshi dumps the whole platter in it.

Karin gulps it all down and gives a small belch, "BBBBBBuuuuuurrrrrppppp!!!" She giggles and pats her belly opening her mouth again, "More love,"

Soshi brought each of the remaining platters full of food and dumps it all down in his girlfriend's maw.

Karin lets out a much bigger and louder burp, "BBBBBBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!"

Soshi puts all the empty platters 50 in all back on the tray.

Karin smiled, "Come and rub my belly love your caress helps me digest faster,"

Soshi walks up to his collosal girlfriend and began rubbing her giant belly.

Karin purrs and moans, "Mmmmmmmm~ so good dear,"

Karin continued ignoring Kei and kept scarfing down her cakes.

Lucertia held her flabby garbage lid sized hands together as she thought of her precious son, "Oh Soshi, my little baby I hope you're okay," She felt squriming under her massive ass and growled, "Oh shut up, you worthless bastard!" She ripped out a massive smelly thunderous fart. PPPPPPPPPPHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAATTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!! She smirked evilly hearing muffled gagging under her, "Breath my natural air slave!"

Under her mountainous ass, wedged in her vast crack was her worthless ex-husband Josh who looked like a darker haired version of her baby boy Soshi. Lucertia hated her husband as much as she loved her son, the minute she gave birth to Soshi she fell in love with her little boy. He was just born and she already viewed her son more as a man than his father no sperm donor. Josh was a weak worthless excuse for a man and was divorced and enslaved by his ex wife and daughters, he was given an experimental drug to give him the attriubtes of a perfect slave, toliet, cushion for Lucertia and her daughters. His only air was the air from Lucertia and her daughters' massive asses and his drink and food was their piss and shit. They owned him and Lucertia made sure her little boy never knew of the bastard spinning a tale of his father dying on the year he was born.

"So slave how does it feel to be owned by a beautiful woman like me?" Lucertia asked in an condescending haughty tone. She farts again. BBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!! "Ahhhh sorry slave, I did that one on purpose," She let out a low hissing SBD immediately after that one and giggles, "Sorry that one was accidental slave," She wiggles and grinds her ass on the bastard relishing in hearing his screams.

Her massive belly rumbles as she grinned evilly, "Looks like you're gonna have an early lunch today slave," She rubs her belly as her asshole puckers open.

1553322.content:
How about his cousins? They go to the same school as their favorite cousin, Soshi, and love him dearly, almost the same extent as his family. But they're much smaller than them and it has been years since they had last seen Soshi and vice versa.

Or perhaps we go with Soshi's maternal grandmother, as she's one the one that gave Soshi's family the 'good' genes, if you know what I mean.
1553322.title: Cousins or grandmother?

info.brief_description: This is an alternate version of Soshi Niji and his Giant SSBBW Girls.
info.description:
14 yr old Soshi Niji is the only boy in an all girls' academy and this one is a very special academy for very unique and super-sized girls.

Main Characters:

Soshi Niji (14 yrs old, looks younger though, 3'11, 108lbs): He is kind,smart, loving, and extremely shy around girls, he is the lover of the biggest and most powerful girl at the academy and is the only boy there.

Karin Tepes (18 yrs old, 14'1, 15,900lbs): the biggest girl at the Super Obese Monster Girls' Academy, she adores her little boyfriend/lover Soshi and will kill anyone who hurts him or even looks at him wrong.

Chishio Tepes (16 yrs old, 9'11, 10,800lbs): Karin's younger sister, she too adores her sister's boyfriend and Karin has promised to share him with her. Second biggest girl in the academy.

Naomi: (18 yrs old, 9'6, 7,900 lbs): A Nine-Tailed Fox who Soshi has known since freshman year. She loves him too.

Sara: (18 yrs old, 9'5, 7,900 lbs): A Harpy who also is a friend and love interest of Soshi's.

Yui: (17 yrs old, 9'5 7,800 lbs): A Snow Woman who has deep feelings for Soshi.

Kiko (17 yrs, 9'4, 7,700 lbs): A Siren who has feelings for Soshi but is too shy to admit them.

Kunia: (17 Yrs, 9'1, 7,600 lbs) A Cat-Girl who loves Soshi too. She is ver playful as expected of her species.

Soshi's family:

Lucretia Niji (39 yrs old, 15'6, 17,500lbs): Soshi's mother, she is a stay at home mom and loves her son deeply, she often sends him letters asking how he's doing

Aiko Niji (26 yrs old 13'1, 9,980 lbs): Lucretia's eldest child and Soshi's eldest sister she often makes her little brother's food for him to take to school with him.

Akemi Niji (20 yrs 13', 9,500 lbs): Second eldest sister, loves to dress and undress in front of Soshi.

Ai Niji (18 yrs 12'10, 9,300 Ibs): Youngest of the elder Niji girls loves to sneak into Soshi's room and cuddle with him at night.

Mizuki Niji (9 yrs old 12'5, 8,800 lbs): Soshi's little sister she adores her big brother and often worries about him.

Megumi Niji: (8 yrs old 10'5, 8,800 lbs): The youngest of Lucretia's children, like her older sisters she loves her big brother very much
